entry.title: Location: Furball Plaza
entry.summary: Furball Plaza is the central hub of the game, where cats can gather, socialize, and access shops and various activities. Key locations include the Catnip Caf√©, Catwalk Boutique, and Art Studio. This is the main area/location of the game! Probably the busiest and most active.
entry.content:
Furball Plaza is the central hub of the game, where cats can gather, socialize, and access shops and various activities. Key locations include the Catnip Caf√©, Catwalk Boutique, and Art Studio.

This is the main area/location of the game! Probably the busiest and most active. :)

entry.title: Location: Moonlit Meadow
entry.summary: I shared one of the base locations on the Discord server, so why not share it here as well! Moonlit Meadow is a serene and grassy area that comes alive under the glow of the moon where shooting stars can often be seen. Cats can…
entry.content:
I shared one of the base locations on the Discord server, so why not share it here as well!

Moonlit Meadow is a serene and grassy area that comes alive under the glow of the moon where shooting stars can often be seen. Cats can take a walk in the meadow, play games, stargaze and unwind. At the center of the meadow, cats can find a campfire and sit around it to tell nighttime stories.

What do you think? It's my personal favorite. :)

entry.title: Thank you r/ClubPenguin!
entry.summary: Just wanted to thank the r/ClubPenguin community on Reddit for being awesome! They participated in the survey I made to know more about player preferences and other stuff, and they have been super great and wholesome. A big thank you to the moderators for letting…
entry.content:
Just wanted to thank the r/ClubPenguin community on Reddit for being awesome!

They participated in the survey I made to know more about player preferences and other stuff, and they have been super great and wholesome. A big thank you to the moderators for letting me share the project and blog too! :)

I finished setting up the Discord server, it doesn't have a logo yet but I will work on that ASAP, join it!

I will probably share some little secret stuff like some locations/WIP designs etc...

Until then, see you later! üêà
